alert.note: Alert for Monroe (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 06 at 1:50AM EDT until April 06 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding along Irondequoit Creek is expected. * WHERE...A portion of western New York, including the following county, Monroe. * WHEN...Until 145 PM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding along Irondequoit Creek. Flooding may impact Ellison Park and other low-lying areas along the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 144 AM EDT, Levels on Irondequoit Creek are expected to rise through around daybreak, and then drop off very slowly during this morning and through the afternoon hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Irondequoit, East Rochester, Brighton and Penfield. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
